title: T213-2 Chase Trophy Buffalo Fed. SOLD

posts.post_title: T213-2 Chase Trophy Buffalo Fed. SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi, thanks to a fellow board member, I was able to upgrade my low grade Chase Trophy card, so I am selling this card.

I checked my records today and I saw that I only paid $36 for this card - not $60.

I paid [STRIKE]$60[/STRIKE]  $36 on eBay for this one, so I would like to get [STRIKE]$60[/STRIKE] $36 and I will pay for shipping.  Regular PP, check or money order.

If you are interested, please claim it in this thread and then send me a PM.


Thanks, Rick

I will take it


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
